column4: hmm, I wish someone could tell me why Ubuntu One Music Store's music is encoded in MP3
interesting.
exactly. I think its real weird
for a company promoting open source and patent-free products, I think its almost hypocritical
all I can think is its so folks can download the music as dumb ipods don't play ogg as its too awesome :)
who uses Linux only with an iPod when they have to have either Mac OS or Windows to set it up using iTunes >_>
I don't use apple products on principle as well as they suck
same here, the only one actually worth considering IMO is the iPod touch
could log a bug ;). All ipods are rubbish, so little features for so much cash, but its shiny shiny
oh yeah jailbreak definately required
thunderbird has no exchange support
so betterness depends on requirements
you mean the little envelope thing?
well, yeah I guess so
